context.p: To split a cell back into cells that were merged, take the following steps:

step.cmd: Place the cursor in a cell that you want to split.

choices.choice: To split the cell horizontally, choose Table Split Cell Above/Cell Below , or click the Split Cell Above/Split Cell Below button on the toolbar.
To split the cell vertically, choose Table Split Cell Before/Cell After , or click the Split Cell Before/Split Cell After button on the toolbar.
